results.name: Matrix log of triangle A111830, which shifts columns left and up under matrix 7th power; these terms are the result of multiplying each element in row n and column k by (n-k)!.
comment: Column k equals 7^k multiplied by column 0 (A111834) when ignoring zeros above the diagonal.
